name: coop-secure-spawn-areas
title: Coop Secure Spawn Areas [WIP]
author: ttv/Ismoh_
description:
Good news to announce!

Coop-Secure-Spawn-Areas is now pretty stable on multiplayer sessions!

This mod creates teams and also modifies the map to have separated secure starting spawn areas.

Think of each Base for each Team.

Enjoy and have fun!
